channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Hazardous Materials; INC#0284; 07:50AM; 2101 E Pacific Coast Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AWlQfE; #Wilmington; The hazardous materials risk has been mitigated. A total of four patients have been transported from the scene, one of which was rescued by a rigid basket/stretcher and lowered by a rope system to ground level (patients: 35M moderate, 43M moderate, 26M moderate & 40M serious). No further hazard.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AP65 BC13 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E21 E221 E248 E285 E3 E38 E48 E49 E85 EM1 EM13 EM4 HR3 JT1 JT4 JT6 PI1 RA101 RA112 RA21 RA266 RA36 RA38 RA57 RA64 RA66 RA848 SQ21 SQ48 T21 T38 T48 T85 UR85; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hazardous Materials; INC#0284; 06:39AM; 2101 E Pacific Coast Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AWlQfE; #Wilmington; Gases leaking in the area, reported to be butane and hydrogen sulfide, and several patients are in need of medical assistance. LAFD has responded with Hazardous Materials and USAR specialists. The leak has now been shut down. Patient care is in progress by Firefighter Paramedics. Ages/genders/conditions unknown at this time.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E21 E221 E248 E285 E3 E38 E48 E49 EM1 EM13 EM4 HR3 JT1 JT4 JT6 RA101 RA112 RA21 RA266 RA36 RA38 RA57 RA64 RA66 RA848 SQ21 SQ48 T21 T38 T48 T85 UR85; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0142; 03:49AM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; #ExpositionPark; A one-story vacant restaurant, fully involved with fire (and site of previous burns), took 22 minutes to extinguish in defensive mode by the first 30 firefighters to arrive. No reported injuries. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E266 E34 E46 EM11 RA15 T15 T26 T66; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0142; 03:27AM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; #ExpositionPark; One-story vacant restaurant with heavy fire showing throughout the building. Defensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E266 E34 E46 EM11 RA15 T15 T26 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0197; 04:45AM; 8304 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lq1yQF; #Florence; Firefighters found an approximately 25' x 75' one-story commercial building with heavy fire showing. It took 32 firefighters 21 min to extinguish the flames, sparing the nearby apartment from any damage. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA33 RA833 RA857 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0197; 04:24AM; 8304 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lq1yQF; #Florence; One-story commercial building with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA33 RA833 RA857 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0536; 09:59AM; 11144 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LMXQlk; #GranadaHills; Firefighters found a one-story row of commercials with smoke showing. Firefighter made entry and found one unit (operating as a restaurant), with fire inside. It took the first 28 firefighters 19 minutes (10:18am) to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E105 E227 E27 E275 E288 E290 E293 E298 E70 E75 E8 E87 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA75 T27 T75 T88 T90 T93 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0270; 06:42AM; 2000 N Stadium Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oS8MFk; #ElysianPark; Firefighters arrived to find wires down into a vacant (boarded up) one-story bungalow, with heavy fire showing (and threatening trees). Thirty-four firefighters successfully protected the exterior vegetation and extinguished the flames in 18 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E203 E220 E3 E4 FR201 RA20 RA4 SQ21 T20 T3; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0270; 06:24AM; 2000 N Stadium Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oS8MFk; #ElysianPark; One-story vacant single-family home with heavy fire showing. Flames are threatening nearby trees on the exterior. No other structures threatened.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E220 E3 FR201 RA20 SQ21 T20; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Civilian Fatality Vehicle Fire; INC#1617; 08:49PM; 12640 W Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/41VxO55; #ValleyVillage; PRELIM: LAFD crews arrived to find a vehicle fire to the rear of a vacant two story commercial building. As they quickly extinguished the burning sedan without damage to the structure, they discovered the burned remains of an adult male adjacent to the vehicle. No other injuries were reported. The fire cause is under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAPD (Incident #4431) and Coroner.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E278 T78 RA78 E102 E60 BC14 T60 E260 RA878 PH1; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
